oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FACILE S-MONODEMETHYLATION OF 3,4,5-TRIS(METHYLSULFANYL)-1,2-DITHIOLIUM IODIDE - CRYSTAL AND MOLECULAR-STRUCTURE OF THE OBTAINED 4,5-BIS(METHYLSULFANYL)-1,2-DITHIOLE-3-THIONE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, JD
SINGH, HB
DAS, K
SINHA, UC
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reaction of 3,4,5-tris(methylsulfanyl)-1,2-dithiolium iodide with NaBH4 gives a mixture of 4,5-bis(methylsulfanyl)-1,2-dithiole-3-thione 3 (major product) and 2a or 2b (minor product); the crystal structure of 3 is described.
